exm.mng: Chutien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Zhushan county in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei, Zhushan or Chushan town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Dazhu county in Dazhou 達州|达州[Da2 zhou1], Sichuan
to plan in advance (idiom), a card up one's sleeve, forewarned is forearmed
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom), fig. innocent children's games, childhood sweethearts, a couple who grew up as childhood friends
